name: Satanic Dystopia - Double Denim Shotgun Massacre 10''
description: "DISGUSTING, CRUST RIDDEN SPEED THRASH!" [Iron Fist] Northern Scum Black Thrashing Metal influenced by Celtic Frost, Kreator, Sodom, Aura Noir and sleazy cinema. Eight tracks of unadulterated terror on a 10" in a fold-out sleeve, limited to 250 copies. The first 50 orders get a free patch. Listen *NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. Release Date TBA. If you order more than one copy you will only get 1 patch.

name: Perverticon - Extinguishing the Flame of Life LP
description: Perverticon, arguably an abomination that should have been strangled with its own umbilical cord, came into existence in late 2011. The ambition since then has been to create punishing and unrelenting, yet atmospherical black metal, firmly rooted in an intensive hatred towards this vermin-infested planet. The first manifestation of this is their debut album Extinguishing The Flame Of Life, released in the Winter of 2013 through Mordgrimm. Released in a limited edition of 300, available now. Listen to some tracks from the album

name: Lluvia - Premonicion De Guerra CS
description: Limited tape version of the Lluvia album, in an edition of 200 copies. The pro-duplicated release comes in an A5 box with hand embossed cover, together with a 12 page A5 booklet. Listen to a track from the album *TAPES ARE IN STOCK NOW.

name: Lluvia - Premonicion De Guerra LP
description: Forged in blood over the past two years, PREMONICION DE GUERRA is the debut album from LLUVIA, an entity which has emerged from the ashes of THE RAIN IN ENDLESS FALL. A declaration of intent through 46 minutes of vast, captivating black metal. 333 copies on grey/black 180 gram vinyl and housed in a gatefold jacket with an insert. Listen to a track from the album *NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. VINYL IS EXPECTED TO SHIP FROM THE U.S. TO EUROPE THE WEEK OF DECEMBER 9TH. Price is due to shipping costs from the U.S. (due to it being a 180gm Gatefold) and expected Customs Fees.

name: Tukaaria - Raw to the Rapine LP
description: Vinyl version of this essential album from 2011. An impossible fusion of carnality and atmosphere. Limited to 500 copies on 180gm vinyl, printed on reverse sleeve with gold metallic ink. Listen *NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. VINYL IS EXPECTED TO SHIP FROM THE U.S. TO EUROPE THE WEEK OF DECEMBER 9TH.

name: Death Fortress - Mirror Into Eternity CS
description: Over thirty minutes of relentless black metal from DEATH FORTRESS, set to be released on cassette in November. This marks the last solo attack before the debut LP, which will feature a full lineup for the first time... Listen *NOTE: THIS IS A PRE-ORDER. STOCK IS EXPECTED TO SHIP FROM THE U.S. TO EUROPE THE WEEK OF DECEMBER 9TH.

name: Hazarder - Against His-Story, Against Leviathan!  LP
description: "Hazarder are a hard-hitting Sludge/Stoner Metal Band heavily influenced by Sleep, Motorhead, Kyuss and High On Fire. Their blend of Sludge/Stoner Metal music is a thrilling blast of top-notch riffs from start to finish." [The Sludgelord] Named after the 1983 book on Anarcho-Primitivism by F. Perlman, Against His-Story, Against Leviathan! is an immense slab of colossal doom. *IN STOCK NOW. Listen to a track Co-released by Mordgrimm, Neanderthal Stench, Black Dawn Records, Insane Society and PMK Records.

name: Cult Of Fire -Triumvir√°t LP
description: Original self-released version from 2012. 180g vinyl with heavy Gatefold Sleeve and A1 poster. These came direct from the band.

name: Serpent Omega - Serpent Omega CD
description: Vomited from the mouth of the Great Serpent in 2011, Serpent Omega are a brooding, powerful beast of a band from Stockholm, Sweden, who meld doom, black metal, sludge and crust punk to create blood-stirring, earth-shattering riffs. Influenced by bands such as High on Fire, Sleep and Black Sabbath, their sound is sometimes guttural, sometimes mesmeric but always coupled with a pounding malevolence; the band live by the maxim that you should not only listen to music, you need to feel it. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should pre-order the CD from Mordgrimm Vinland Listen to tracks from the album

name: Totenwolf - Night Path of Pest CD
description: Raw Pagan Black Metal from Moscow, Russia. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should pre-order the CD from Mordgrimm Vinland Listen to a track from the album

name: Grime - Deteriorate CD
description: Slow and anvil heavy, Grime channel the essence of suffering and aggression into a vitriolic, black cacophony. Hailing from Trieste, Italy, their debut full length is now available on CD, a baleful concoction of sludge and doom metal designed to hammer home the filth, depravity, negativity and despair that is the band's trademark sound. Featuring former members of The Secret, ‚ÄúDeteriorate‚Äù was recorded at Igloo Audiofactory in Italy by Enrico Baraldi and mixed and mastered by audial wizard Billy Anderson with ominous and expertly crafted art from Jason Barnett. Deteriorate fits perfectly in any record collection next to Eyehategod, Iron Monkey, Grief, and Meth Drinker. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from Mordgrimm Vinland Listen to a track from the album

name: Crypt Lurker - Baneful Magic, Death Worship and Necromancy Rites Archaic CD
description: Nihilistic doom metal with influences sourced from black and death metal, best defined as a crawling, monstrous terror, narrated by spectral howls weaving tales of sorcery, death and the abyss from the dusty pages of archaic tomes. CD is now in stock. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should pre-order the CD from Mordgrimm Vinland Listen to a track from the album

name: Xothist - Xothist LP
description: *NOW IN STOCK! Harrowing, dark and unsettling ambient black metal. Originally released in 2011 to 46 copies on cassette by BLEAK ENVIRONMENT, the debut offering from XOTHIST showcases mechanical black ambient that appears to draw influence from acts such as DARKSPACE and XASTHUR, while creating a feel that is completely unique unto itself. Re-mastered in 2012 by Xothist specifically for this release. Listen to the album

name: Last Copy Left
description:
A list of stock that are either down to the last copy, or that we've found an extra copy of, in many cases these have sold out from the label so we won't be getting any more in... In some cases the price is higher to reflect current market value of older/rarer stock.

Any item with an asterisk (*) after it was received with slight damage (invariably a small ding to one corner).

description: Regnum Saturni is presented as a three-panel-foldout 2LP (180gm vinyl) w/ laser etched d-side. This full-length is the first Fell Voices album with a title assigned by the band and runs roughly 60 minutes in length.

Patch 2: 'Sigil' patch, 13x13cm, ltd. 10

name: Mosquito Control - Destroyed Beyond Redemption CD
description: Torturous Sludge/Doom Metal from Auckland, New Zealand, influenced by Burning Witch, Khanate, Saint Vitus, Noothgrush, Winter, Thergothon. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from Mordgrimm Vinland Listen to the Album

name: Runes of the Evening - Runes of the Evening CD
description: Melodic Black Metal from Dallas, Texas. Jewel case CD with eight page booklet. Mastered by James Murphy Post-Production by Anil Carrier (Binah, The Solemn Curse) *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from The Lair of Filth Listen to the Album

name: Lychgate - Lychgate CD
description: Lychgate blend the mood of experimental doom with the execution of soundscape & melody-driven black metal. The result is something avant garde, expressive, atmospheric, and altogether unique. Featuring members of Esoteric, Lunar Aurora, The One and Omega Centauri, with artwork by Manuel Tinnemans. Limited vinyl version available on Gilead Media. Limited CD & T-Shirt package available, the extra postage costs are calculated into the package price. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from The Lair of Filth Listen to a track from the album

name: Acolyte - Alta CD
description: Alta - the monumental debut album from Acolyte An hour of progressive blackened metal, for fans of Enslaved, Deathspell Omega, Blut aus Nord, Virus. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from The Lair of Filth Listen to a track from the album

name: Serpent Omega - Serpent Omega LP
description: Now available, the debut album from Swedish band Serpent Omega. Featuring former members of bands such as Abuse and Burnher, they meld sludge, doom and black crust, evoking the Great Serpent with monstrous rituals. Released as a limited vinyl LP version of 250 black and 250 dark green with black splatter, it comes with an insert housed in a gatefold with matt finish, and spot gloss on metallic gold. A patch is included in the LP order (one per customer). ***Vinyl/Shirt packages now available! The price of the shirt also includes the extra postage costs for the additional weight. Listen to the album *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the LP from The Lair of Filth

name: Primitive Man - Scorn LP
description: ***Vinyl/Shirt packages now available! The price of the shirt also includes the extra postage costs for the additional weight. Hailing from Denver, Colorado, Primitive Man create a punishing blackened doom/sludge with traces of drone and d-beat. If you listen to bands such as The Body, Thou or Khanate then their earth-shattering, bleak wall of crushing dissonance and pure sonic heaviness is for you. Though Scorn is only the band‚Äôs debut full-length, it already sounds like one of the heaviest and most brutal records you‚Äôll hear for a while. Thirty nine minutes of pure, unrelenting destruction that will leave you bruised and bleeding. ‚Ä¢ Recorded by Dave Otero at Flatline Studio ‚Ä¢ Co-released by Mordgrimm and Throatruiner Records ‚Ä¢ 180-gram black vinyl with innersleeve and reverse-board cover ‚Ä¢ Includes free digital download Listen to the album

name: The Solemn Curse - Gateways to Eternity CD
description: "a blackened death metal assault of the grimmest variety." Terrorizer Abyssal Dark Metal from the U.K., influenced by Dissection, Carcass and Vital Remains. Limited CD to be released in early 2013. Six track EP featuring a guest appearance from Aort (Code / Binah / Indesinence). *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from The Lair of Filth Listen to some tracks

name: Balam - Balam Digi-CD
description: ***CD/Shirt packages now available! The price of the shirt also includes the extra postage costs for the additional weight. "An over-fuzzed Black Mass sweeping through a village at Dawn" This Providence, Rhode Island quintet produce a hypnotic, psychedelic Doom in the vein of Sleep and Om. Listen to the CD *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from The Lair of Filth or the Balam Store

name: Ildjarn-Nidhogg - Norse / Svartfr√•d Slipcase Digi-2CD
description:
Deluxe Re-Issue of Ildjarn's cult early work with Nidhogg
Luxurious limited double Digi-CD in Slipcase packaging!

Superbly packaged 2-CD edition, with each disc coming housed in a stunning digifile, assembled inside a solid slipcase. All executed on special black cartone with silver printings. Also included inside is a set of 6 artcards in appropriate size, on rough cartone in classic black/white. Released by Eisenwald, Germany.

ILDJARN was a black metal band from Norway, formed in 1991 and active until 1997, has been hailed as one of the purest and most ferocious musical projects within the realm of extreme music. The music can be described as primitive and pretty lo-fi black metal, straightforward drums, riffs and harsh, hateful vocals, the later musical creations ventured into Ambient spheres. Although some releases included collaborations or guest appearances from other musicans (Nidhogg, Ihsahn, Samoth) the sole creator and man behind was always Vidar, who was previously also active with Thou Shalt Suffer (pre-Emperor) and later with Sort Vokter. Ildjarn showed true mastery in its craft, building ambience by simple tones, riffs and rhythmic arrangements that often tend to be more like a buzz of noise compared to common music.This essential and unprocessed 4-track musical force has always been exceeding and pushing the limits of emotional perception for most of its receivers.

name: Axis of Light & Death Fortress - Split CS
description: Spiteful, uncompromising Black Metal from two of the harshest bands in Black Metal. Axis of Light corrupted the listener with their demo, 'By the Hands of the Consuming Fire' (released on Mordgrimm), and Death Fortress unleashed a furious assault on their self titled tape (released by Mordgrimm and Fallen Empire). Following both bands' appearance on the SVN OKKLT double cassette compilation, they now combine their pandemonic utterences for this split tape release. Axis of Light - Illuminating the temple / Secrets of the tomb Death Fortress - From the immortal thrones Released 20 April 2013 on Mordgrimm/Fallen Empire in an edition of 200 copies. Customers from North, Central and South America should order from FALLEN EMPIRE

name: Fallen Empire
description: All currently available Fallen Empire 7" releases are listed here. LP's and Tapes are currently listed individually on the main page. BLUT DER NACHT - SARGNAGEL 7" Raw, toxic black metal from the U.S. Limited edition of 300 copies. Listen to the stream TRIST - NOSTALGIE 7" Classic Trist, but evoking a different emotion than many of his other works. Limited to 300 copies on black vinyl. name: Evilfeast - Wintermoon Enchantment DLP
description: The fourth full length album of Evilfeast is a timeless masterpiece of true epic grandeur. Majestic Black Metal atmospheres and haunted ambience, penetrating eerie synths and grim guitars.. Double LP in a gatefold sleeve, released by Amor Fati Productions. Listen to the album

name: Necromancy - Ananta Aradhana LP
description: Old school black death metal with touches of doom and punk from Sweden, featuring members from Putrid and Lamentation. recommended for fans of Bulldozer, Master‚Äôs Hammer and Nifelheim. The LP is limited to 300 copies with 100 on purple vinyl, released by Psychedelic Lotus Order from China. Listen to a track.

name: Nekrokaos - Chaos IV LP
description: The new Nekrokaos album in LP format, limited to 100. "IV" is inhuman Black Metal; primitive, instinctive, rotten. Pure dungeon music, for those into LLN influenced Black Metal and Abruptum.

name: Wodensthrone - Loss DLP
description: One of the best U.K. Black Metal albums of recent years, their debut album was pressed on to a luxurious double album by Thorn Laceration Records, released in an edition of 500, 200 of which were blue vinyl copies. Listen to a Sample

name: Old Forest - Into the Old Forest CD
description: Mordgrimm has re-released the classic debut album from the cult U.K. horde in a digipak format with new artwork. A pean to early Emperor, Burzum, Mayhem, Darkthrone, Beherit; the old gods of Black Metal. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the CD from The Lair of Filth

name: Nathorg - Beyond the Gates of Nathorg CD
description: Nathorg is a Iranian black death metal band and was formed by Gaztus in the beginning of 2010, its members Gaztus, Holatoth and Gorkh gave birth to their first release ‚ÄúBeyond the Gates of Nathorg‚Äù. In 2012, Xarkhim and Ordal entered the gates to complete the bloodline. Nathorg's objective is the fight against the filthy human world. North and South American Customers please visit Unmerciful Death Productions

name: Mourning Dawn - For The Fallen DLP
description: Originally released by Total Rust, this classic melancholic doom album received a vinyl release through U.K. label Aesthetic Death. Listen to a Sample

name: Axeman - Arrive MLP
description: Release by Darkest Heavy from Texas, originally on cassette through Crepusculo Negro, now mastered with high quality packaging. Axeman is the solo project of Volahn, a melding of Amebix and G.I.S.M. mixed with an 80's Brazilian/L.A. metal sound. With pure devotion to the ancient cults, "Arrive" merges indigenous underworld apocalyptic destruction. For worshipers of Amebix/Slayer/Sepultura/G.I.S.M./Sarcofago... Listen to a Sample

name: Isterismo - Tokyo Crusties LP
description: This LP discography contains seven different recordings from manic Japanese hardcore band Isterismo, who feature members of Kriegshog, and brings a raging, noisy brand of hardcore akin to D-Clone, the aforementioned Kriegshog, and other bands of that scene. Listen to a Sample

name: Kroda - Fimbulvinter DLP
description: Released by Neue Aesthetik, Purity Through Fire and Razed Soul in n edition of 500 gatefold LPs. The bonus tracks on side 4 are the songs of the "Falcon Among The Cliffs", part of the "Kulturkampf" CD/DVD. Listen to a Sample

name: Miasmal - Miasmal LP
description: Miasmal unleashing a d-beat based death metal attack in the pure old Swedish tradition, with reverence to early Entombed and Dismember. Repressed by Agipunk and limited to 500 copies. Listen to a Sample

name: Acephalix ‚Äé‚Äì Interminable Night LP
description: Evil, raw, venomous crust/death metal with nightmarish vocals. Released on Agipunk and compiling two demo tapes that were recorded in 2010, pressed in an edition of 1000 copies. listen to a sample

name: Embers - Shadows DLP
description: Hailing from California, Embers combine elements of Black metal, Doom and Crust, imagine Ludicra and Remains of the Day rehearsing with Emperor in the depths of a crypt, and you would be close... Released by Iconoclast Records on Double LP, limited to 500 copies. listen to a sample

name: √Üsah√¶ttr -  √Üsah√¶ttr LP
description: Re-released by Iconoclast Records on 12" black vinyl. 300 copies on black wax, cover and back with spotted gloss ink. Listen to a Sample

name: Usurpress - Trenches of the Netherworld LP
description: Death crust from this Swedish quartet, combining the bestiality of old Death metal and the aggression of crust. Released by Iconoclast Records on black vinyl, limited to 500 copies. Listen to a Sample

name: Humus - Humus LP
description: Italian Grind/Power Violence with a nod to UKHC (including a Heresy cover). 500 copies on black vinyl with gloss sleeve, a double-sided 12x12 insert and poster.

name: Huata - Atavist of Mann CD
description: "Discover the occult side of the modern history, satanic truth about commanders and sects chiefs, holy quests and processions through infernal lands, and great prophecies to come" [Huata] Printed in two editions: Gatefold CD (ltd. 500) and Jewel Case. *Customers from the U.S., Canada, Latin and South America should order the jewel case CD from The Lair of Filth listen to a sample

name: √òdelegger - The Titan's Tomb LP
description:
Raw Black Metal side project of Widar (Bilskirnir, Ulfhethnar) in the vein of Ildjarn, recommended! Available in vinyl only and limited to 500 copies.

Note: Copies have a small dent in one corner.

name: Dolorvotre - Dolorvotre LP
description: Released by The Ajna Offensive, this is a remastered version of their debut cassette on Crepusculo Negro. Hellish and hallucinogenic raw hatred from possibly the best known Black Twilight Circle act. listen to a sample

name: Exitium - Ad Regnum Sathanas LP
description: Norwegian Black Metal from LFM of Vemod. Gatefold LP version released in 2005 by Nordkult Rituals with 8 versions of songs from the original tape plus 3 new tracks. Limited to 500 copies.

name: Lake of Blood - As Time and Tide Erode Stone LP
description: Vinyl version of the CD released by Human Jigsaw. 500 units. 400 on black vinyl. 100 on white. Jackets are heavy stock and comes with a small poster. Released by The Flenser. listen to a sample

name: Enth & Amarok - Split LP
description: A massive doom assault! Enth from Poland play funeral doom with a Corrupted influence; Amarok from the U.S. mix Khanate drone with modern doom, like Thou with dual vocals. Listen to a Sample

name: Highgate - Highgate LP
description: Highgate are a nasty hybrid of minimalist Doom, experimental noise and grim Black Metal (think about a crossbreeding between Dark Throne and Eyehategod). Released by Vendetta Records and Psychic Assault and limited to 300 handnumbered copies.

name: All Pigs Must Die - God is War LP
description: Formed from members of Converge, The Hope Conspiracy, and Bloodhorse, All Pigs Must Die is what you could call a supergroup. Previous bands aside, they craft their own powerful and unique sound with this project. They create hardcore with metal and punk tendencies that isn‚Äôt afraid to get a little crusty at times. Released by Southern Lord on 180gm vinyl. Listen to a Sample

name: Ares Kingdom - Incendiary LP
description: Ares Kingdom‚Äôs music descends directly from the traditions of classic heavy metal, thrash and death metal, while at the same time transcending any such categorization. Theirs is a sound attributable to AK alone, yet it remains a sound familiar to those that still remember Slaughter Lord, Mefisto and Poison. Gatefold LP on Nuclear War Now! listen to a sample

name: Ash Borer - Demo 2009 LP
description: ASH BORER'S 2009 demo, remixed and mastered at mammoth sound studios. Released by Vendetta Records in with a letter-pressed / silk-screened cover. listen to a sample

name: Batillus - Furnace LP
description: Heavy as fuck and as soul crushing as doom can be, as enjoyable as it is all out brutal. listen to a sample

name: Crucified Mortals - Self-Titled LP
description: Well-written, energetic thrash in the vein of Razor, Sodom, Slayer and Kreator, with vocals that remind me of a mix between Tom Araya and King Fowley. [FromTheDustReturned] Gatefold LP on Hells Headbangers Records listen to a sample

name: Diet Pills - Diet Pills LP
description: "This is poisonous, evil stuff. Shifting their Melvins-meets-Flipper sound towards a far heavier, constipation-curing (early) Corrupted-esque level, Diet Pills have mastered the power that a truly obscene, downtuned low-end can have, especially when coupled with riff structures that twist and turn in nifty ways." [Collective Zine] Listen to a Sample

name: Crowskin - Black Lava LP
description: CROWSKIN come up with their first full length album, once again exploring the depths of slow, heavy and brutal sludge doom. Released by Vendetta Records. listen to a sample

name: Drainland & Trenches - Split LP
description: Drainland offer 4 songs of noise drenched hardcore. Slow, fast, heavy and powerful. For fans of Unruh, Noothgrush and Dystopia. Trenches on the other side come with their first output on vinyl. One song that lasts for about 14 minutes. I guess they could be best compared to a mixture between Ire and Isis (Celestial period). Released by Vendetta Records. Listen to a track by Drainland

name: Eagle Twin & Pombagira - Split LP
description:
Exclusive recordings on a split vinyl release
350gsm reverse board with silver metallic
180gm Black and White streaked vinyl
Limited to an edition of 500 copies.

name: Ensorcelor - Crucifuge LP
description: Two brand new Ensorcelor tracks: By Mycomancy Insumed (14:28) c/w Crucifuge (20:45) 180g black vinyl with engraved run-out grooves. Printed in spot gloss UV ink on 16pt stock jackets with full colour printed sleeve. These were imported direct from the label, hence the price. Listen to a Sample

name: Forgotten Tomb ‚Äì Negative Megalomania LP
description: Released by Obscure Abhorrence Productions, 350 copies on black vinyl in a gatefold LP. *Note: the sleeves have a very small dent in one corner. listen to a sample

name: GGUW - Gegen Gravitation und Willensfreiheit 12" MLP
description: Raw Black Metal. Edition of 321 hand-numbered copies, pressed on 180g black vinyl and comes in a black poly-lined inner sleeve. It is packaged with a poster (320x640mm) which is housed in a silk screened PVC sleeve. listen to a sample

name: The Guilt √òf‚Ä¶ - Self-Titled LP
description: Noise / Industrial / Punk, from New Orleans LA, U.S. Featuring Mike IX Williams (EyeHateGod, Arson Anthem, Outlaw Order) & Ryan McKern ( Wolvhammer, Ierased). Black vinyl version, limited to 250 copies on At War With False Noise. Listen to a Sample

name: Luciation ‚Äì Manifestation In Unholy Blackness LP
description: Raw and violent occult black metal, degenerate unholy art at its finest. This MLP features all new and never released material, some of their strongest to date. A monument to Him. Comes with insert and band logo patch. listen to a sample

name: Lycus - MMXI MLP
description: Vinyl version of the brilliant demo by Oakland's Lycus. Orginally released by Graceless recording on Cassette the Flenser vinyl re-edition has been mastred by Colin Marston. Extra heavy stock printed on reverse board. Reimagined artwork by Bryan Proteau. Released by The Flenser. listen to a sample

name: Nine Covens - ...On the Coming of Darkness DLP
description: "Featuring current and ex-members of some of the key extreme bands from the last decade, Nine Covens came together to explore the darker, more brooding aspects of Black Metal and in doing so have created a virulent, belligerent and passionate account of the weakness that exists in humanity. Their need to challenge these human failings and those of all enemies of reason have resulted in their debut album ‚Äú‚Ä¶On The Coming Of Darkness‚Äù. A confrontation to the eternally weak and all who follow without question to reflect on themselves and consider an alternative." Limited vinyl version of their debut album on Candlelight. Double 180gm 12" in a 300gsm Gatefold Sleeve with Matt Finish for the price of a single LP. Pressing of 300, includes bonus track not on the CD version. U.S. Customers please visit Fallen Empire Watch The Video

name: Nine Covens T-Shirt
description:
Large Double-Sided White Print on Black Shirt

S, M & L Sizes Left

*Please note: if you live in Europe click on France when paying, it is the same postage rate for all of Europe.

name: Obliteration - Nekropsalms LP
description: Old School Putrid Death Metal from Norway. U.S. Pressing on Forcefield Records, comes in a gatefold sleeve. Listen to a Sample

name: Pombagira - Iconoclast Dream LP
description: Fuzz drenched psychedelic heaviness, alternating between the intense heaviness of Acid King/Electric Wizard/Sunn O))), and a mellower 60s style psych trip; with Satan on vocals. 180gm Black Vinyl, Full Colour Sleeve and Inner Bag. Limited to 500 and co-released with Black Axis Records. U.S. & Canadian Customers please visit Fallen Empire

name: Selbstmord - Dawn of a New Era LP
description: Uncompromising Polish Black Metal. Vinyl release of their 2009 album with two bonus tracks and new artwork. Limited to 300 copies. Released by Darker than Black. Listen to a Sample

name: Thou & Cower - War is the Force... Split LP
description: Thou play dark, depressing riff oriented metal, these new tracks are some of the shortest and most brutal songs they've recorded. Cower from California blast out 90's style power violence influenced by Bovine and Pessimiser Records... Beautiful packaging and artwork, limited to 900 Black Vinyl. Listen to a track by Thou

name: Undead Creep - The Ever-Burning Torch LP
description: From Sicily, Undead Creep play a pure Swedish-oriented death metal assault without compromises. Obscure, raw, brutal guitar riffing, granitic rhythm section and occult lyrical themes, as tradition teaches. If you love Nihilist, early Entombed and Dismember, you‚Äôll love these too. Released on Iconoclast Records in a gatefold sleeve, limited to 500 copies. Listen to a Sample

name: Villains - Road to Ruin LP
description: Distilled and potent complex blackened thrash for which Villains have long been revered, ‚ÄúRoad to Ruin‚Äù is the band‚Äôs most coherent effort to date, decadent and destructive, as alluring as it is malevolent. Nuclear War Now! Productions 2011 listen to a sample

name: Vomitchapel - Damnatio ad Bestias LP
description: Side-project of Father Befouled, this release features a collection of the "Warvomitdeathworship" and "Sodominate" demos, together with threee new tracks. Black vinyl version, limited to 367 copies. Listen to a Sample

name: Daze √ñf The Undergr√∂und - A Tribute T√∂ Hawkwind 3LP
description: Triple LP boxset on Black Widow Records, Italy. Tributes by Amorphis, Sigh, Acid King, The Meads of Asphodel and Litmus amongst others. *Please note: if you live in Europe click on France when paying, it is the same postage rate for all of Europe. listen to a sample
